title: How Can I Install Nginx on AWS EC2 Ubuntu 16.04 Machine and host Multiple Websites.
content: Nginx ( /ˌɛndʒɪnˈɛks/ EN-jin-EKS[8]) (stylized as NGINX, NGiИX or nginx) is a web server which can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache. The software was created by Igor Sysoev and first publicly released in 2004. A company of the same name was founded in 2011
